heading: HR02548
0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE METROPOLITAN WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE SYSTEM (MWSS), MWSS-REGULATORY OFFICE (MWSS-RO), NATIONAL WATER RESOURCES BOARD (NWRB), LOCAL WATER UTILITIES ADMINISTRATION (LWUA), BUREAU OF SOILS AND WATER MANAGEMENT (BSWM), NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA) MANILA WATER COMPANY, INC. (MWCI), AND THE MAYNILAD WATER SERVICES, INC. (MWSI) TO IMMEDIATELY FORMULATE A WATER SECURITY MASTERPLAN TO SECURE AND SUSTAIN THE SUPPLY OF WATER FOR HOUSEHOLD, COMMERCIAL, AND INDUSTRIAL USES IN METRO MANILA THAT MAY BE DUPLICATED IN OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY
mother-bill statusstatus: Adopted as Resolution No. HR00207 on 2019-06-04 Substituted by HR02593
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02548
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE METROPOLITAN WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE SYSTEM (MWSS), MWSS-REGULATORY OFFICE (MWSS-RO), NATIONAL WATER RESOURCES BOARD (NWRB), LOCAL WATER UTILITIES ADMINISTRATION (LWUA), BUREAU OF SOILS AND WATER MANAGEMENT (BSWM), NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA) MANILA WATER COMPANY, INC. (MWCI), AND THE MAYNILAD WATER SERVICES, INC. (MWSI) TO IMMEDIATELY FORMULATE A WATER SECURITY MASTERPLAN TO SECURE AND SUSTAIN THE SUPPLY OF WATER FOR HOUSEHOLD, COMMERCIAL, AND INDUSTRIAL USES IN METRO MANILA THAT MAY BE DUPLICATED IN OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA, CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2019-04-29
